welcome_message_body: Welcome to Paombong, Philippines! Known for its picturesque landscapes and warm, hospitable locals, we invite you to experience the charm of our city and all it has to offer. Enjoy your stay and explore everything Paombong has in store for you.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Baler Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the terminal for passengers to use.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The oldest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: Also known as the Centennial Terminal, it primarily serves international flights for Philippine Airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 3
terminals.description: The newest and largest terminal at Ninoy Aquino International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights for multiple airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: Also known as the Domestic Terminal, it serves domestic flights for multiple airlines.

wifi.note: Limited to 2 hours per device. Additional time can be purchased.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal for domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A newer terminal mainly used by low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
